abstract: ABC News, Facebook and WMUR, the ABC affiliate in New Hampshire, will sponsor back-to-back Democratic and Republican presidential debates on Saturday, Jan. 5, three days before the state’s primary election.
lead_paragraph: ABC News, Facebook and WMUR, the ABC affiliate in New Hampshire, will sponsor back-to-back Democratic and Republican presidential debates on Saturday, Jan. 5, three days before the state’s primary election.

headline.main: ABC Plans Back-To-Back New Hampshire Debates
